title.narrative: Pilot project: Wellbeing by Green and Smart Energy

description.narrative: The aim of the project is to develop rapidly scalable business model and technology that decreases consumer price of energy increases electricity availability and makes energy system less depending on fossil fuels.Technical commercial and social requiremen ts and opportunities are already analysed in project feasibility study.Business plan will be done together with local specialist based on the feasibility study and piloting results. The business plan will be used also for scaling the business later on.The place of installation is already checked and approved during feasibility study phase.The pilot project includes delivery of 20-30kW solar power plant 35-70kVA Dynamic Power System that monitors and controls energy efficiency and inverts solar power and nec essary amount of energy storage capacity. Especial Blockchain-based control and invoicing system will be developed and several power meters will be installed for monitoring and creating technical platform for the sales of energy. Cleaner Future Oy and Nord ic ST Engineering and Consulting Oy have already established a company in Somaliland to operate the pilot plant. Real commercial operation of the company will be started after successful operation of the pilot project.The piloting verifies our way of coupl ing different technologies taking into account especial conditionsn and needs in the target country. The technology and business model is rapidly scalable in other African countries as well. Local staff will be trained to build install and operate the pilo t system. Trained personnel will be hired to expand the operations when scaling the business. The project leads to increased economic activity improves the local living conditions and decreases dependency from fossil fuels.
